SAMRAI::mesh

Box Generation

These classes are used to generate a union of boxes covering a collection of tagged cells on a single AMR. The procedure implemented here includes some extensions to the algorithm introduced by Berger and Rigoutsos.
  • SAMRAI::mesh::BergerRigoutsos
  • SAMRAI::mesh::BoxGeneratorStrategy
  • SAMRAI::mesh::HistogramBox
